title: Giro d'Italia: Remco Evenepoel withdraws from race lead because of Covid-19
description: Race leader Remco Evenepoel is out of the Giro d'Italia after testing positive for Covid-19, with Geraint Thomas moving up to first.

title: Espanyol 2-4 Barcelona: Robert Lewandowski scores two as Barca wrap up title
description: Barcelona seal their first La Liga title since 2018-19 with four games to spare after a stylish win at the home of city rivals Espanyol.

title: Watch: Best bits from the Baftas... in 80 seconds
description: From actors lost for words to stage selfies, this year's TV awards had it all. Catch up now.

title: 'It feels like there is no hope' - Arsenal's title dreams fade
description: The Premier League title is not yet mathematically unobtainable but the reaction of Arsenal players and fans after the home loss to Brighton suggests they think it is.

title: S Club confirm tour to go on after Paul Cattermole death
description: But the band members announce on Instagram that Hannah Spearritt will not be joining the anniversary tour.

title: Italian Open: Cameron Norrie sets up Novak Djokovic meeting in Rome
description: Britain's Cameron Norrie beats Marton Fucsovics to set up an Italian Open last-16 meeting with Novak Djokovic.

title: Ja Morant: Memphis Grizzlies suspend star after he again appears to hold up a gun
description: The Memphis Grizzlies suspend Ja Morant after he again appears to hold a gun in a video.

title: 'Victory for the grind' - relentless Chelsea become 'hybrid monsters'
description: Despite several things being new in this year's Women's FA Cup final it still delivered the same outcome - a Chelsea victory and a Sam Kerr winner.

title: Arsenal 0-3 Brighton & Hove Albion: Gunners title challenge suffers devastating blow
description: Arsenal's fading title hopes were dealt a devastating blow after losing to Brighton to leave leaders Manchester City one win from a fifth Premier League title in six seasons.

title: Sale Sharks 21-13 Leicester Tigers: Sharks reach first Premiership final in 17 years
description: Sale overcome holders Leicester in a bruising and tense semi-final to reach their first Premiership final for 17 years.

title: TV Baftas 2023: Kate Winslet and Billie Piper walk red carpet
description: Billie Piper was among the stars pictured before the ceremony at London's Royal Festival Hall.

title: Women's FA Cup final: Sam Kerr scores Chelsea winner against Man Utd and celebrates with backflip
description: Sam Kerr scores the only goal of the Women's FA Cup final for Chelsea against Manchester United at Wembley and celebrates with a backflip.

title: Belarus leader Alexander Lukashenko misses event, fuelling health rumours
description: Speculation about Alexander Lukashenko's health has grown after he missed a key state celebration.

title: 'Suspected drone' disrupts Gatwick Airport flights
description: Operations at Gatwick were suspended temporarily with 12 planes diverted but have since resumed.

title: Everton 0-3 Man City: Erling Haaland and Ilkay Gundogan score
description: Manchester City require two victories to retain the Premier League title after despatching relegation-threatened Everton at Goodison Park.

title: Rob Burrow carried over marathon finish line
description: The Leeds event is named in honour of ex-rugby league player Burrow, who has motor neurone disease.

title: Labour considers extending voting rights to EU citizens
description: The party is working on proposals on voting rights but says no final decisions have been made.

title: Coventry held by Middlesbrough in play-off first leg
description: Coventry fail to get a shot on target as they are held to a goalless Championship play-off semi first-leg draw by Middlesbrough.

title: Indian Premier League: Joe Root out for 10 as Royal Challengers Bangalore thrash Rajasthan Royals
description: Joe Root out for 10 in his first Indian Premier League innings as Rajasthan Royals are thrashed by Royal Challengers Bangalore.

title: Women's European Under-17 Championship: England 2-1 Poland - highlights
description: Michelle Michelle Agyemang scores twice as England's European Under-17 Championship campaign starts with 2-1 win against Poland.

title: Lord Sentamu: Former Archbishop of York asked to step down from Church
description: It follows a review into how the former Archbishop of York handled a child sex abuse allegation.

title: Kenya cult: Children targeted to die first, pastor says
description: Fresh accounts emerge of the final days of deceased members of a Christian doomsday cult in Kenya.

title: Mauricio Pochettino: Why the Argentine believes Chelsea is the perfect club for him
description: Spanish football expert Guillem Balague explains why former PSG manager Mauricio Pochettino has chosen Chelsea as his next destination.

title: Mauricio Pochettino: Chelsea agree deal to appoint ex-Tottenham boss as new manager
description: Chelsea have agreed terms with former Tottenham boss Mauricio Pochettino to become their new manager.

title: Sunak five pledges 'difficult' but government committed - Shapps
description: Grant Shapps accepts the five promises - on inflation, the NHS, and more - are "difficult and very detailed".

title: Leeds 2-2 Newcastle: Police charge man with assault and entering field of play at Elland Road
description: Police charge a man with assault and entering the field of play after an incident during Leeds' Premier League game against Newcastle.

title: Ukraine's Zelensky visits Germany day after weapons pledge
description: President Zelensky's trip comes after Germany said it would supply weapons worth three billion euros.

title: Janibek Alimkhanuly defends WBO middleweight world title and calls out Saul 'Canelo' Alvarez
description: Janibek Alimkhanuly defends his WBO middleweight world title with an impressive second-round knockout of Steven Butler before calling out Saul 'Canelo' Alvarez.

title: Eurovision euphoria on the streets of Liverpool for host city's big night
description: The city's party extended well beyond the televised celebrations and went on well into the night.

title: Cyclone Mocha: Intense cyclone hits Bangladesh and Myanmar coast
description: Half a million people are evacuated to safer areas in Bangladesh as the powerful storm nears.

title: Fred Kerley: World 100m champion on aiming for double gold, Lamont Marcell Jacobs and athletics' future
description: World 100m champion Fred Kerley tells BBC Sport about his bid for double gold, his rivalry with Olympic champion Lamont Marcell Jacobs, and the future of athletics.

title: Turkey decides on future with or without Erdogan
description: Turks are voting in the most pivotal elections in their modern history.

title: Pat Cullen: Nursing union calls for double-digit pay rise to restart talks
description: Union boss Pat Cullen urges ministers to reopen pay talks in England after her members rejected a 5% offer.

title: Ferrari resists pressure to phase out combustion engine
description: The boss of the supercar maker said it would be "arrogant" to dictate to customers what they can buy.

title: Who's in the running for this year's Bafta TV Awards?
description: This Is Going To Hurt and The Responder are among the frontrunners at this year's ceremony.

title: From Syria to Sudan: The nightmare followed me
description: Kareem thought he had found safety but his life was then engulfed in violence once more.

title: Why did UK's Mae Muller do so badly?
description: The singer scored a genuine hit with I Wrote A Song, so why did voters award her so few points?

title: The daring riders of India's 'well of death'
description: The drivers defy gravity to ride their bikes and cars inside a giant wooden barrel to entertain people.

title: Chile's new law blazes trail for children of femicide victims
description: A new law will provide an allowance for children of mothers killed by their partners or ex-partners.

title: The transgender Indonesian Muslims trying to secure their future
description: The country's only Islamic centre for trans women is in jeopardy after the death of its leader.

title: Thailand elections: Polls open with Thaksin's daughter as frontrunner
description: Voting begins with Paetongtarn Shinawatra promising an end to conservative, military-backed rule.

title: Ukraine war: Russians in Germany split over Putin's invasion
description: Many Germany-based Russians are repeating Kremlin disinformation about the invasion of Ukraine.

title: Is the UK too late to beat the US in the global trade war?
description: The US is offering huge incentives to electric car firms, but the UK risks falling behind.

title: Cha Cha Cha, Mel the milkmaid and other memorable Eurovision moments
description: Neon green bolero jackets, a piano fit for a princess and other highlights from Eurovision 2023 in Liverpool.
